channel.description: when i make objects how can i turn the object so it will be west/east instead of South/north?

item.title: [RESOLVED] objects
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Um, I’m unreliable so this may totally spaz out, but here is my answer:

makeGlobalObject(2445, 3097, 4156, 0, 10);//portal
I assume you know how to add objects, so I’ll just tell you how to change the way they face.
Or, at least, the way I think you change it.

Anyway, you see in the code I posted, there is a ‘0, 10);//portal’? Well, I think you need to change the 0 I just mentioned to a:
1 for North (or -1),
2 for East (or -2),
3 for West (or -3)
or leave it as 0 for South.

Hope it helps, but don’t quote me on it, i’ve never really used it before.

Read full topic
